title: Run /speckit.specify for homepage/portfolio site
description: Use the speckit.specify skill to create the feature specification for the personal portfolio website. Capture: sections needed (hero, about, projects, publications, CV download, contact), visual direction, and any content requirements. Output: .specify/specs/001-portfolio-site/spec.md
close_reason: spec.md written to specs/001-portfolio-site/spec.md; all checklist items pass

title: Create GitHub Actions deploy workflow skeleton
description: Once plan.md confirms the build step and output directory, create .github/workflows/deploy.yml using actions/deploy-pages@v4. Includes: configure-pages, upload-pages-artifact (path TBD from plan), deploy-pages. Also set GitHub Pages source to 'GitHub Actions' in repo settings (manual step â€” document in README).
close_reason: Deferred to implementation phase: covered by T051 in tasks.md

title: Commit and push spec-kit planning artifacts
description: Final commit before implementation begins. Stage and commit: .specify/specs/001-portfolio-site/ (spec.md, plan.md, research.md, data-model.md), .github/workflows/deploy.yml, any README updates. Commit message: 'docs: add portfolio site spec and implementation plan (speckit 001)'. Then git push.

title: Run /speckit.plan for portfolio site
description: After spec is clarified, run /speckit.plan to produce the technical implementation plan. Key decisions to resolve: tech stack (vanilla HTML/CSS/JS vs lightweight SSG), build step tooling (image optimization, CSS minification), file/directory structure, GitHub Actions deploy.yml path config. Output: .specify/specs/001-portfolio-site/plan.md, research.md, data-model.md if needed.
close_reason: Plan complete: plan.md, research.md, data-model.md, quickstart.md generated

title: Run /speckit.clarify to de-risk spec ambiguities
description: After spec.md is written, run /speckit.clarify to identify and resolve underspecified areas before planning. Focus on: visual direction, content sections, any interactive features, domain/DNS status. Output: answers encoded back into spec.md
